title: This haptic chair has a fatal flawâ€¦ - Cooler Master Synk X
description: Get a dbrand skin or grip for your devices today at   UPDATE: We heard from Cooler Master that the chair's casters are "Pressure casters" which prevent the chair from moving while someone is sitting on it for stability, and that the backrest's tilt structure may have been damaged during use as it is not meant to recline without using the seat tilt lever.  Colton is away, so Jake snuck in to take a look at Cooler Master's upcoming Synk X chair that features RGB, Bluetooth connection, and Haptic Feedback for the "ultimate gaming experience." Can Cooler Master deliver the gamer dream, or should you stick to using your dining room chair?  Learn more about the Cooler Master Synk X:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    SUBSCRIBE ON FLOATPLANE:    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Do not drop 0:27 Unboxing the stinky chair 2:09 Adjustability and build materials 3:56 Laying back and getting comfy 5:26 Sponsor - dbrand 5:42 The control panel and RGB 6:46 Connecting it to the PC and trying it out 8:46 How to successfully set it up via Bluetooth 9:00 Gaming - Assetto Corsa 9:47 A big issue and overall thoughts 11:36 Outro
